SEARCH
Package GameEngine

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.Transform
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransform
public class Transform extends Object implements ITransform
Class that represents a transformer for an object. Responsible for moving, rotating, and scaling the object.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Transform

      public Transform(Point pos, int layer, double angle, double scale)
      Constructor for a transform, gives the inicial values for it.
      Parameters:
      pos - position of the object
      layer - layer of the object
      angle - angle of the object
      scale - scale of the object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the position is null, the layer is negative, or the scale is negative
